title: CLAUSE 1- AGE REQUIREMENT
description:
We want to uphold a respectful atmosphere for everyone, which implies that you must obey these fundamental rules of conduct and behaviour.
Comply with applicable laws, that include; supervision, sanctions, penalties and human trafficking laws
Obey the rights of others, including the privacy and intellectual property rights of our website.
